required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Effects of Kinesio Taping in Women With Primary Dysmenorrhea

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of our study was to investigate the effects of kinesio taping in women with primary dysmenorrhea.

primary_outcome.measure: The severity of menstrual pain assessed with Visual Analog Scale
primary_outcome.description: A 10-cm Visual Analog Scale anchored from zero (no pain at all) to 10 (the worst pain I have ever felt) was used to determine the severity of each subject's menstrual pain.

secondary_outcome.measure: The complaints related to menstruation will be evaluated by a form prepared by the researchers
secondary_outcome.description: The form assessing the complaints related to menstruation will be evaluated existing complaints affect the patient and expressed as, no, little, mederate, very.

secondary_outcome.measure: The level of anxiety will be evaluated with The Spielberger State Trait Anxiety Inventory
secondary_outcome.description: The Spielberger State Trait Anxiety Inventory is a 40-item self-report inventory designed to measure both state anxiety section (current feelings of apprehension, worry, etc.) and trait anxiety section (continuous feelings of apprehension, worry, etc.). Each section is scored on four levels of anxiety intensity from 1="not at all" to 4="very much" and with a sum score between 20 and 80. A higher total score indicates more severe anxiety level.

arm_group.description: Kinesio tape application has been applied
Sham kinesio tape application has been applied

intervention.description: Kinesio tape application will be performed.Taping is carried out from the estimated day of ovulation (cycle length in days minus 14) until the next menstrual period begins
Sham kinesio tape application will be performed. Sham taping is carried out from the estimated day of ovulation (cycle length in days minus 14) until the next menstrual period begins
The natural process will be followed from the estimated day of ovulation (cycle length in days minus 14) until the next menstrual period begins

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- 18 to 35 years of age,
- having Primary Dysmenorrhea
- being volunteer women
Exclusion Criteria:
- having give birth,
- having a serious psychiatric disorder
- having used oral contraceptive or depression drug in the last 6 month
- having secondary dysmenorrhea
- having irregular menstrual cycle
- having allergy to taping
